titleStmt.title: Excommunicatio excommunicata, or, A censure of the Presbyterian censures and proceedings in the Classis at Manchester wherein is modestly examined what ecclesiastical or civil function [sic] they pretend for their new and usurped power : in a discourse betwixt the ministers of that Classis, and some dissenting Christians.
titleStmt.author: Allen, Isaac, 17th cent.

titleStmt.title: Excommunicatio excommunicata, or, A censure of the Presbyterian censures and proceedings in the Classis at Manchester wherein is modestly examined what ecclesiastical or civil function [sic] they pretend for their new and usurped power : in a discourse betwixt the ministers of that Classis, and some dissenting Christians.
titleStmt.author: Allen, Isaac, 17th cent.
Allen, Isaac, 17th cent.
Heyrick, Richard, 1600-1667.

notesStmt.note: "Ministers of the Classis" include R. Heyrick and others and "dissenting Christians" include I. Allen and others. Cf. BM.
Imperfect: all after p. 55 lacking; pages torn, and stained. Best copy available for photographing.
The word "function" on t.p. has been struck through and replaced in ms. by "sanction".
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
